headline: Assessing Las Vegas Sands After Its 33% Rally and Asia Focus in 2025
summary: If you are wondering whether Las Vegas Sands is still a smart buy after its big run, or if most of the upside is already priced in, you are not alone. That is exactly what this deep dive will unpack. The stock is up 33.1% year to date and 24.6% over the last year, with a more modest 0.5% gain over the last month and a slight 0.7% dip in the past week that may be catching value minded investors’ attention. Recent headlines have focused on the company doubling down on its Asian resort...
